replies.body: This error indicates a network problem failing to reach the patching servers.  Give the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide a go to get this fixed up.  Hope that helps!

Unfortunately that didn't help, i also sent in  a ticket, with a zip file of my logs from hextech repair tool so i hope when they respond i'll have a better fix. I've read that a lot of other people are having similar problems with this patch
Im getting that too I think I am just going to redownload all of leagues and see if that works
